speaker: Dave
dialog: Hey HAL, could you run a diagnostic check on all ship systems?

speaker: Hal
dialog: Of course, Dave. Initiating diagnostic scan now. Plese stand by.

speaker: Hal
dialog: MY F.P.C. shows an impending failure of the antenna orientation unit.

speaker: Dave
dialog: Let me see the antenna alignment display, please.

speaker: Hal
dialog: The unit is still operational, Dave. but it will fail within seventy-two hours.

speaker: Dave
dialog: I understand Hal. We'll take care of it. Please, let me have the hardcopy.

speaker: Dave
dialog: It's time to go to the RIGHT side.
